General.Name: Unionman Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Unionman Technology Co.,Ltd. produces, sells, and services multimedia information terminals, smart home network communication equipment, Internet of Things communication modules, optical communication modules, smart security equipment, and related software systems and platforms. It offers IPTV/OTT/DVB set-top box, broadband products, IoT communication modules, optical communication modules, and IP cameras. Unionman Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Huizhou, China.
